thread.section_title: The Roosevelt Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Historic & NYC Central
thread.title_full: Historic & NYC Central - Review of The Roosevelt Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Rosemarie R
title: Historic & NYC Central
text:
The staff were kind, the room and bathroom were small but clean, the bed was super comfy but the decor could use some updating. The walls are thin so it's a bit noisy if you need sound sleep. The location is central to many of the city's great restaurants, Broadway and all the tourist spots. Everything is in walking distance.
Room Tip: Request a quiet floor if you want sound sleep. See more room tips
